revision.text:
==Maltese== {{mt-root|x-w-k}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|mt|ar|شَوْك}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|mt|/ʃɛwk/}} ===Noun=== {{mt-coll-noun|sing=xewka|p=xwiek|pauc=xewkiet}} # [[thorn]]s, [[prickle]]s #* {{quote-song|mt |author=Traditional |artist=Frans Baldacchino |title=Ja ħanina |passage=Jien tlajt fuq l-ogħla muntanja, rajt il-baħar qed imewweġ.
'''Xewka''' daħlet ġewwa qalbi, meta smajt li se tiżżewweġ. |t=I went up to the highest mountain, watched the sea wave back and forth.
'''A thorn''' had pierced my heart when I heard that you would marry.}} # [[thistle]]s # [[fishbone]]s #: {{syn|mt|xewk tal-ħut}}
